like Luke said, nudism and nudist beaches aren't something to sexualize. Clothes are a double-edge sword. They cover the ugly and beautiful equally. Remove them and you get the good and bad. This manga also spreads another falsehood that if a dick is large flaccid, then it is even larger erect. Dicks come in two varieties: grow-ers and show-ers. Dicks that grow in size compared to when flaccid and ones that are pretty much show the same size regardless of being erect. Which is why porn actors are rarely shown non-erect, because it would ruin the illusion that guys with huge dicks always look fundamentally different from the average guy. If you search out vids of them flaccid, you'll see I'm right. Anyways, this manga pushes a lot of male insecurity falsehoods, the main one being that all you need to get girls to flock to you regardless of your personality, is a big dick. haha I hope the author doesn't really believe in all these myths.
